description: This file declares exported API functions for the Http Ato Method object in a HTTP server implementation. It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the AtoMethod component used in the HTTP processing pipeline.

methods.name: HttpCreateAtoMethod
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Http Ato Method object, taking container, owner, and reserved contexts as parameters.

methods.name: HttpAtoMethodCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Ato Method object with provided contexts.

methods.name: HttpAtoMethodRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the Ato Method object.

methods.name: HttpAtoMethodEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Ato Method instance.

methods.name: HttpAtoMethodInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Ato Method object instance.
